item.title: MILITSIONER open playtest now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Escape an ever-changing town guarded by a giant cop.

An open playtest for immersive simulation game MILITSIONER is now available for PC via Steam, publisher Critical Reflex and developer TALLBOYS announced.

Here is an overview of the playtest, via Critcal Reflex:

Explore a dynamic clockwork town, navigate the colossal policeman’s changing needs and emotions, and use your wits to escape from his watchful eye your own way.

The titular colossal Militsioner demanded that the following information be provided with a few fresh details on what players can expect!

  • You’re Always Being Watched – You can run, but you can’t hide from the Militsioner. Everything you do is monitored—from stealing, to vandalism, to being a menace to the local townsfolk.
  • Judgment Is Inevitable – There will be moments where you’ll have to decide what kind of person you are—and the town responds accordingly. Maybe you can build goodwill through meaningful conversations and have the townsfolk assist you. Or perhaps you’re more likely to use people as pawns to achieve your goals. Either way, the town always remembers.
  • There’s No Such Thing As A Simple Escape – This immersive sim isn’t for the faint of heart. You’ll need to learn the lay of the land, wait until the Militsioner is at his most vulnerable, and put your escape plan into action. But be warned. The consequences of a failed scheme could cost more than you’re willing to pay

A release date for MILITSIONER has yet to be announced.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: NetherWorld launches September 12
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Demo now available.

Pixel art side-scrolling action adventure game NetherWorld will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on September 12, publisher SelectaPlay and developer Hungry Pixel announced. A demo is available now for both platforms, and users can pre-order a physical edition for Switch.

Here is an overview of the game, via SelectPlay:

About

Step into Medoo’s tentacles one last time as NetherWorld prepares to unleash its full, filthy glory. What starts with a marriage crisis spirals into a riotous narrative adventure packed with brutal boss battles, twisted humor, roguelike dungeon runs, and a cast of deranged characters you’ll love to hate (or hate to love). Whether you’re gambling away your dignity in vile minigames or facing off against nightmarish foes, every moment of NetherWorld is soaked in sleaze, style, and strangely heartfelt depravity.

Key Features

  • Narrative Mayhem – Help Medoo piece together his broken life through a twisted, alcohol-fueled journey full of depraved humor and outrageous encounters.
  • Unhinged Minigames – Win items and money in drinking competitions, seedy encounters, shootouts, or while controlling Tick Joe in filthy roguelike dungeons.
  • Brutal Boss Battles – Face off against savage bosses with a wide array of weapons—or go in swinging with bare tentacles.
  • Pixel Art with Bite – Explore a beautifully grotesque pixel world packed with shocking surprises and morally questionable choices.
  • Depravity with Depth – Beneath the drugs, bullets, and vodka, NetherWorld explores real themes of loneliness, failure, and trying to put yourself back together.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

item.title: Survival crafting adventure game Witchspire announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Due out in Early Access in 2026.

Envar Games, the newly established game development division of Envar—known for co-development contributions to titles like League of Legends, Overwatch 2, and Valorant—has announced Witchspire, a survival crafting adventure game launching in Early Access for PC via Steam in 2026.

“Witchspire marks a new chapter for us as a studio, and we couldn’t be prouder,” said Envar CEO Atey Ghailan in a press release. “We’ve worked with industry giants such as Riot Games, Blizzard Entertainment, Tencent, Netflix, and Wizards of the Coast and now have the opportunity to create our own world in the survival and adventure game genres. This announcement is our first step in building a AA studio and establishing Witchspire as a fresh, new quality [intellectual property] and we’re delighted to be able to share it with you.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Prepare to get lost in the hand-crafted world of Witchspire, a cooperative survival adventure game where you and your friends assume the roles of novice witches and wizards striving to find their way home in a magical land where an ancient darkness rises.

Key Features

  • Survival Made Magical – Call forth forests when you’re short on timber, spirit jump up ledges, blink out of the way of attacks, and send out magical pickaxes to do the tedious work.
  • Befriend Diverse Familiars – The wilderness is filled with fascinating creatures, defeat them in battle and collect their spirits to tame familiars. Build long-term bonds and guide their growth to support your play style and needs.
  • Conjure a New Home – Use astral projection to untether yourself from gravity, allowing for free movement as you build the perfect home to suit your coven’s needs.
  • The Ancients and Corruption – Falling comets, corrupted spirits and deadly creatures lurk in the shadows, waiting. You must keep your wits about you, and prepare for whatever darkness stirs beneath the surface.
  • Find Your Strength in Numbers – Dive into a cosmos of customization where a branching tech tree, player levelling, and varied crafting options give every witch a part to play in uncovering the mystery of the Witchspire. Start on your path with unique outfits and abilities by joining a coven, from the brave Cloudpiercers, to the mystical Foretellers.

A Game for Everyone

  • I’m looking for… Survival
    • Build freely with Astral Projection.
    • Master a cosmos of upgrades.
    • Magically conjure and harvest resources.
    • Craft and loot useful gear.
    • Battle wild and corrupted creatures.
  • I’m looking for… Creature Collecting
    • Form bonds and level them.
    • Discover unique and rare variants.
    • Assign tasks to your Familiars.
    • Use special abilities in combat.
    • Unique creatures to different biomes.
  • I’m looking for… Adventure
    • Explore gorgeous hand-crafted biomes.
    • Traverse the skies by Broom.
    • Play solo or in cooperative play.
    • Travel in style with magic.
    • Adventure through ancient ruins.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Bounty Star: The Morose Tale of Graveyard Clem launches October 23
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Over-the-shoulder 3D action game dated.

Over-the-shoulder 3D action game Bounty Star: The Morose Tale of Graveyard Clem will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on October 23, publisher Annapurna Interactive and developer DINOGOD announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Annapurna Interactive:

About

Bounty Star is an over-the-shoulder 3D action game that marries mech combat and customization with farming and base building. The player takes on the role of a broken but powerful ex-soldier named Clem, a war veteran, talented fighter and expert mech pilot. Clem attempts to shed the guilt and shame of her past and become a legitimate force for good in the Red Expanse, a post-post-apocalyptic version of the American Southwest.

Key Features

  • Customizable Mech Action – You pilot the Desert Raptor MKII, a Mech of extraordinary power. It is a highly-customizable battle vehicle that can be equipped with a variety of offensive systems: heavy, high-powered melee weapons, steam powered hydraulic siege weapons, explosive firearms, and more. It can also be equipped with a variety of defensive systems; high-speed thrusters, boosters for dashing, riot shields, among others.
  • Become a Bounty Hunter – The Red Expanse is a rich farming and mercantile region plagued by violent criminals and dangerous beasts. The government that remains outsources justice to experts like Clem—bounty hunters who are free to pursue their targets into whatever dangerous corners of the world they hide. She’ll fight her way through many corners of the region and deal with these marks as she sees fit.
  • Repair and Upgrade Your Homestead – Clem comes into an isolated and run-down garage that serves as a suitable base of operations and home—just barely. Build out water and power supply lines, grow and cook food, produce ammunition and fuel for combat, and raise animals. This decrepit ruin has a lot of potential, but it will have to grow alongside Clem.

item.title: Roguelite rhythm dungeon crawler BPM Bitcrushed announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Kwalee and BPM Bullets Per Minute developer Awe Interactive have announced BPM: Bitcrushed, a roguelite rhythm dungeon crawler coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

From the makers of BPM: Bullets Per Minute, BPM Bitcrushed is a roguelite, top-down dungeon crawler rhythm game that fuses the pulse-pounding action of BPM: Bullets Per Minute with retro-inspired pixel art. Every move—whether shooting, jumping, or dodging—syncs to the beat, making rhythm as crucial as reflexes. As players explore procedurally generated dungeons, they’ll uncover a wide variety of powerful weapons, unique items, and rhythm-based abilities. Enemies attack in time with the music, turning every battle into a high-stakes dance of destruction. Feel the intensity rise as the beat drives both you and your foes in an immersive, music-fueled combat experience. Plus, with the custom music feature, you can add your own tracks to the game and experience a whole new level of rhythm-driven chaos.

The Final Beat

Ragnarok, the prophesied end of the world, is approaching, a seemingly unstoppable and inevitable event. However, there’s a belief that it can be averted. The Azure Ember, the universe’s rhythmic pulse, is key to its prevention. The slowing of this Azure Ember is the cause of Ragnarok’s approach; once it ceases, the world will end. Hel, the Queen of Helheim, actively seeks to accelerate Ragnarok by draining Melody Fragments from the Azure Ember.

Rhythm Combat

Enter a world where destruction is an art form, and combat unfolds as a deadly dance synchronized with the music’s pulse. Your shots must land in perfect time, but so too must those of your adversaries. Foes swarm and strike in unison, their most devastating attacks telegraphed beats before impact. Victory hinges not merely on precision aiming, but on impeccable timing. Anticipate the rhythm, leap to evade incoming barrages, and unleash your own rhythmic counter-fire to decimate your enemies.

Death is Not the End

Defeat is inevitable, but it’s also the key to progress. While each death will send you back to the hub (we call it The Sanctum) without your run-specific upgrades, any permanent meta-progression you’ve unlocked is yours to keep. Learn from your mistakes, visit The Sanctum to grow stronger with your new unlocks, and dive back in ready to push further than before.

Key Features

  • Unleash your arsenal and outmaneuver foes in perfect sync with the music.
  • Each dungeon is procedurally generated giving the player a different experience each time.
  • With custom music support, you can fight to the rhythm of any song you own.
  • Found the perfect dungeon? Use its unique seed to replay it, master every corner for a speedrun.
  • Create a level playing field. Seeds generate the exact same dungeon layout, items, and enemies every time—perfect for competitive runs.
  • Daily Run Challenge. Experience the game anew each day with Daily Runs, offering a structured and competitive way to play. Your end score is recorded on an online leaderboard, adding significant replay value.
  • Setlists and song packs. In this game the player can assign each dungeon a specific in-game song from any official song pack.
  • Progression. An Ever-Evolving Challenge: Unlock new characters, weapons, enemies, and more.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord expansion ‘War Sails’ launches this fall alongside major free update
item.content:encoded:
Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord expansion “War Sails” will launch this fall alongside the major update version 1.30, developer TaleWorlds Entertainment announced.

Here is an overview of the expansion, via TaleWorlds Entertainment:

About

The “War Sails” expansion marks a significant shift in Calradian warfare by officially introducing naval battles for the first time. The Viking-inspired Nordic faction brings its legendary seafarers and fierce close-quarters fighters to the fore, ready to invade a host of new coastal territories also included in the expansion. Players can command entire fleets, engage enemy vessels, board the ships of their foes, and enforce blockades, adding new strategic dimensions to combat across land and sea.

Key Features

  • Meet the Nords – Chart a course to the Northern Kingdom, home of the fearless Nords. Trade, recruit, or fight in a land of jagged peaks and icy fjords. Will you join the North or take their riches?
  • Master Naval Warfare – “War Sails” brings naval warfare inspired by medieval battles. Master wind and water physics, board or ram ships, cripple foes by shattering oars, sinking hulls, or tearing sails.
  • Explore an Expanded Map – Calradia expands for naval warfare with a northern sea, islands, rivers, and open waters. Sail past barriers, resupply, and battle foes on land and sea.
  • Build Your Fleet – Choose from 18 ships, each with unique handling shaped by wind and waves. Upgrade with siege engines, sails, and rams. Acquire vessels, upgrade ports, or win ships and figureheads.
  • Embark on a Naval Campaign – Sail rivers and seas to strike deep into enemy land. Keep armies supplied, sink foes, and blockade towns. But beware—storms and attrition can undo even the best-laid plans.
  • Expand Your Arsenal – Gather new companions, Nordic banners, hairstyles, tattoos, and armor. Develop your naval skills, craft unique weapons, and wield new spears, swords, and axes to rule land and sea.
  • A Living, Evolving World – Naval systems and Nord faction integrate into Bannerlord’s world, reshaping trade, warfare, and diplomacy.

Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Tormented Souls II launches October 23
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Survival horror game sequel dated.

Survival horror game sequel Tormented Souls II will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG on October 23, publisher PQube and developer Dual Effect announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via PQube:

About

The award-winning survival horror classic is back!

Caroline Walker is back in the sequel to the award-winning classic survival horror. Stalk the halls of haunting monasteries and other nightmarish locations. Brace yourself to confront terrifying creatures armed only with makeshift weapons as you desperately try to rescue your cursed sister.

Key Features

  • Caroline Walker Returns! – After the events of Wildberger Hospital, Caroline yearns for a normal life with her younger sister, Anna. However, fate has other plans. As Anna falls victim to a mysterious affliction, coughing blood and experiencing blackened eyes and moments of unconsciousness, conventional remedies prove futile. In a desperate bid to save her sister, Caroline must turn to the supernatural.
  • An All-New Setting Filled with Unspeakable Horrors… – Welcome to Puerto Miller, a remote Southern American town with a chilling past. Founded ages ago by the reclusive Ismuit tribe—a small religious group that shunned the outside world—the town conceals unspeakable horrors beneath its ancient exterior.
  • Combat Terrifying Creatures with Makeshift Weapons – Face pulse-pounding combat as you confront monstrous creatures using a range of ingenious makeshift weapons. Every corner may hide an enemy, so resource management is key to survival.
  • Solve Mind-Bending Environmental-Based Puzzles – Utilize logic and reasoning to forge connections between items found in the environment and the intricately designed puzzles. Creatively combine resources to unlock twisted enigmas and delve deeper into the dark mysteries that shroud your path.

Watch a new trailer below.

“A New Nightmare” Gameplay Trailer
